mapper.select: select ct.id, ct.name, ct.price, ct.caffeine, ct.sugar, ct.detail, ct.ice, ct.created_at, ct.creator_id, ut.id, ut.name, ut.email, ut.created_at from coffee_tbl ct left join users_tbl ut on ct.creator_id = ut.id
mapper.insert: insert into coffee_tbl (name, price, caffeine, sugar, detail, ice, creator_id) values (#{name}, #{price}, #{caffeine}, #{sugar}, #{detail}, #{ice}, #{creator_id})
mapper.select: select ct.id, ct.name, ct.price, ct.caffeine, ct.sugar, ct.detail, ct.ice, ct.created_at, ct.creator_id ut.id, ut.name, ut.email, ut.created_at from coffee_tbl ct left join users_tbl ut on ct.creator_id = ut.id where ct.id = #{id} and is_deleted = 'n'
mapper.update: update coffee_tbl set name = #{name}, caffeine = #{caffeine}, sugar = #{sugar}, detail = #{detail}, ice = #{ice} where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 'n'
